laboratory_examinations.findings: Hypokalemia, Androstenedione less than 0.3 ng/ml, serum DHEA less than 15.0 μg/dL, 24-h urinary free cortisol (24h-UFC) less than 10 μg/24h, renin 0.24 pg/ml.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Increased levels of blood potassium, estradiol (E2), and 24h-UFC three months after discharge.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Renin levels: 0.19 pg/ml in the supine position and 0.29 pg/ml in the standing position.
ACTH levels: 71.8 pg/ml at 8 AM, 85.0 pg/ml at 4 PM, 59 pg/ml at 12 AM.
Uterine body size about 22x8x4mm, bilateral ovaries not detected, diffuse lesions of left thyroid lobe, hypoechoic TI-RADS III nodules on both sides of the thyroid lobe.
Abdominal occupation due to left adrenal area and prerenal space tumors, bilateral abnormal adrenal enhancement of nodules and mass shadow.
Pituitary form slightly full, height about 0.9 cm.
Homozygous mutation of c.987del in the 17-OHD lease-related gene CYP17A1.
